<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
I'm running a model with fit and test called. However I noticed that on_test_end is not called at the end of test. <denchmark-h:h2>Please reproduce using the BoringModel</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1j5J8TXAIqoFCqc-3WnAPMox8amNsRDjE?usp=sharing>https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1j5J8TXAIqoFCqc-3WnAPMox8amNsRDjE?usp=sharing</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Use following <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1HvWVVTK8j2Nj52qU4Q4YCyzOm0_aLQF3?usp=sharing>BoringModel</denchmark-link> and post here See the code addition at the bottom of <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1j5J8TXAIqoFCqc-3WnAPMox8amNsRDjE?usp=sharing#scrollTo=V7ELesz1kVQo>this cell</denchmark-link> , which prints when the method is hit. Then check the <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1j5J8TXAIqoFCqc-3WnAPMox8amNsRDjE?usp=sharing#scrollTo=AAtq1hwSmjKe>output here</denchmark-link> . Notice how is missing, whereas is present and just fine. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
When running the trainer.test step, on_test_end should be called at the end of test. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
See the shared Colab notebook. comments.comment: Hi! thanks for your contribution!, great first issue!
can you update the notebook permissions?
I just realised there is no on_validation_end/on_test_end hook in LightningModule. It's only present in callbacks.
What does that mean? How can we get it called at the end of test?
is there any reason to not include and hooks in ? cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/orgs/PyTorchLightning/teams/core-contributors>@PyTorchLightning/core-contributors</denchmark-link>
I do not think there is a reason, just missed it...

We should also consider a test for a full hooks life-cycle as done with the callbacks:
pytorch-lightning/tests/callbacks/test_callbacks.py
Line 22 in 8748293
def test_trainer_callback_system(torch_save):

it's there <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awaelchli>@awaelchli</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/tests/models/test_hooks.py>https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning/blob/master/tests/models/test_hooks.py</denchmark-link>
